name: Getty Images Holdings, Inc.
description: Getty Images Holdings, Inc. is a leading global visual content creator and marketplace, renowned for its vast collection of high-quality images, videos, and music that are integral to storytelling across all media platforms. Founded in 1995 by Mark Getty and Jonathan Klein, the company has established itself as a trusted source for creative professionals, businesses, and media outlets seeking to enhance their projects with compelling visual assets. Getty Images offers a diverse range of content, including editorial, creative, and archival imagery, catering to various sectors such as advertising, publishing, and digital media. The company is committed to innovation in the visual content industry, leveraging cutting-edge technology and artificial intelligence to streamline the search and licensing process for users. Getty Images also champions the rights of photographers and content creators, ensuring fair compensation and protection for their work. With a mission to empower creativity by providing essential tools and resources, Getty Images continues to shape the way visual storytelling is experienced globally.

seo.meta_title: Getty Images Holdings, Inc. | Global Visual Content Marketplace
seo.meta_description: Explore Getty Images Holdings, Inc. - a leading provider of high-quality visual content. Discover a vast collection of images, videos, and music for your creative projects.

faq.question: What does Getty Images specialize in?
faq.answer: Getty Images specializes in high-quality visual content, including images, videos, and music for various media.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Getty Images?
faq.answer: Craig Peters is the CEO of Getty Images Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Getty Images headquartered?
faq.answer: Getty Images is headquartered in Seattle, Washington, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Getty Images offer?
faq.answer: Getty Images offers images, videos, and music, including editorial, creative, and archival content.
